Tutorial to Burn this Game in LT 2.0 :

First download and patch the iso with this files : http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/6999991/Final_Fantasy_13-2_XBOX360_LT3.0_ISO_Patch_To_LT2.0_

second : use abgx 1.0.6 on iso

Third : Use ImgBurn to burn the .dvd file, select 2x speed burn, click to start burn, SELECT TRUNCATE! w8 until burn, and PLAY

@isrmicha Dude.Using the abgx 1.0.6 is not recommended for those who have LT 2.0 because it will put the topology data for LT 3.0. If you dont have LT 3.0, It is recommended to use abgx 1.0.5 as it doesn't put the topology data.Using the abgx 1.0.6 after putting the patch will only bring it back to normal and will be only playable to LT 3.0 so u need to patch it again.

Here's a tutorial to burn this game or the other new games (XGD3):

1.If you have LT 2.0,Apply these patch 

http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/6999991/Final_Fantasy_13-2_XBOX360_LT3.0_ISO_Patch_To_LT2.0
(For LT3.0 users, skip this step)

2.Open Imgburn (must be the latest version 2.5.6.0) and go to Tools>Settings>Write. Now select Calculate Optimal if you have the iHas burner and User Specified for those who doesnt have the iHas burner and will use the truncate method.If u select User Specified, write 2086912.
(If the game you have is XGD2, the layerbreak should be 1913760.)

3.Now close the settings and select write image file to disc

4.Load the your .dvd file 

(Be sure to check your dvd file if it has the right layerbreak.If you have the iHas burner and selected the Calculate Optimal, the layerbreak in the dvd file should be 2133520.)

5.Now if you have the iHas burner, select the advanced settings (located on the lower right part). Choose the LITEON tab and enable Force HT,Online HT and SmartBurn.Disable the OverSpeed.(If you dont have the iHas Burner, skip this step)

6. You are ready to burn!

use abgx to check the game crc and see for yourself.

this has nothing to do with burning.  this is about checking the ISO first to see if it matches up with the data from verified game rips...which it doesn't
btw, you can burn and play a game even though game crc is bad.  however, you will get flagged and the game will eventually crash at a certain point when it tries to read the corrupted data.
